title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.6 - Insurer responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.6 - Insurer responsibility

State Regulations
(a) The employer's insurer shall inspect the employer's subject facilities no later
than 60 days from the expiration of the six months allotted for completion of
the remediation. The purpose of the inspection shall be to evaluate compliance
with the consultant's report. (b) The insurer shall, within 45 days after the completion of the compliance
inspection, provide the employer and the department with a copy of its
inspection report. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
59-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
